00016 #include "NetwToMacControlInfo.h"
00017 
00018 #include <cassert>
00019 #ifdef MIXIM_INET
00020 #include <Ieee802Ctrl_m.h>
00021 typedef Ieee802Ctrl           tNetwToMacControlInfoBase;
00022 #else
00023 typedef NetwToMacControlInfo  tNetwToMacControlInfoBase;
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 
00027 cObject* NetwToMacControlInfo::setControlInfo(cMessage *const pMsg, const LAddress::L2Type& pDestAddr)
00028 {
00029   tNetwToMacControlInfoBase *const cCtrlInfo = new tNetwToMacControlInfoBase();
00030 
00031   cCtrlInfo->setDest(pDestAddr);
00032   pMsg->setControlInfo(cCtrlInfo);
00033 
00034   return cCtrlInfo;
00035 }
00036 
00037 const LAddress::L2Type& NetwToMacControlInfo::getDestFromControlInfo(const cObject *const pCtrlInfo)
00038 {
00039   const tNetwToMacControlInfoBase *const cCtrlInfo = dynamic_cast<const tNetwToMacControlInfoBase *>(pCtrlInfo);
00040 
00041   assert(cCtrlInfo);
00042   return cCtrlInfo->getDest();
00043 }
